about_the_game:
The Seven Realms: High Lathión - Official Walkthrough will help you get the most out of your game!

This guide has been written by the game's creators, meaning that all consequences, even publicly unknown ones, have been considered.

Every choice within High Lathión is included but kept concise and spoiler-free.

Using this walkthrough will assist you with:

  • Understanding the direct impact of every choice you make in the game.

  • Seeing how your choices impact relationships with characters.

  • Revealing which choices close off branching paths or open new ones.

  • Uncovering other background stats that will have impacts in the future.

  • Showing how to unlock every lewd scene, achievement/trophy and title menu background.

The walkthrough will be available in PDF format, which you can use alongside the game while playing. To open the document, click the open book icon in the top right corner of the title menu.

Please note that this DLC content may not be compatible on Steam Deck, and will require a PC, Linux or Mac to access.

content_descriptors.notes: This game depicts uncensored sexual content, use of alcohol and violence.
